section.title: Activities
section.para: The Resource Adaptor Type defines one activity object, net.java.slee.resource.tftp.TransferActivity.

The TransferActivity represents a TFTP transfer. It is created on reception of a TFTP requests, and ends on end-of-file, closure of the datastream, or by an SBB invoking sendError() on the TransferActivity Object. The activity object interface is defined as follows:

listitem.para: Retrieves the ID of the transfer.
Retrieves the data stream of the TFTP write request.
Retrieves the data stream of the TFTP read request.
Stores the data of the TFTP write request in the given file.
Sends the content of the given file to the TFTP client that initiated the TFTP read request.
Sends an error to the TFTP client that initiated the TFTP read request.
